description.value: Define Flow Logic to set task to "In Progress" for all "Root" tasks for a project. Any task that has no dependencies and is in the lowest order will be set to In Progress state when the project start date is met.
description.display_value: Define Flow Logic to set task to "In Progress" for all "Root" tasks for a project. Any task that has no dependencies and is in the lowest order will be set to In Progress state when the project start date is met.
